scripts.deploy:production:gzip:css: aws s3 sync www/ s3://way.me --acl public-read --region us-west-2 --content-encoding 'gzip'  --cache-control 'max-age 86400' --exclude '*' --include '*.css.gz'
scripts.deploy:production:gzip:html: aws s3 sync www/ s3://way.me --acl public-read --region us-west-2 --content-encoding 'gzip' --cache-control 'no-cache' --exclude '*' --include '*.html'
scripts.deploy:production:gzip:js: aws s3 sync www/ s3://way.me --acl public-read --region us-west-2 --content-encoding 'gzip' --cache-control 'max-age 86400' --exclude '*' --include '*.js.gz'
scripts.deploy:production:all: aws s3 sync www/ s3://way.me --acl public-read --region us-west-2 --exclude '.gz*'
scripts.deploy:production:delete: aws s3 sync www/ s3://way.me --delete --region us-west-2
scripts.deploy:production: npm run deploy:production:all && npm run deploy:production:gzip:css && npm run deploy:production:gzip:js && npm run deploy:production:gzip:html && npm run deploy:production:delete
scripts.deploy:uidev:gzip:css: aws s3 sync www/ s3://uidev.way.me --acl public-read --region us-west-2 --content-encoding 'gzip'  --cache-control 'max-age 86400' --exclude '*' --include '*.css.gz'
scripts.deploy:uidev:gzip:html: aws s3 sync www/ s3://uidev.way.me --acl public-read --region us-west-2 --cache-control 'no-cache' --exclude '*' --include '*.html'
scripts.deploy:uidev:gzip:js: aws s3 sync www/ s3://uidev.way.me --acl public-read --region us-west-2 --content-encoding 'gzip' --cache-control 'max-age 86400' --exclude '*' --include '*.js.gz'
scripts.deploy:uidev:all: aws s3 sync www/ s3://uidev.way.me --acl public-read --region us-west-2 --exclude '*.gz'
scripts.deploy:uidev:delete: aws s3 sync www/ s3://uidev.way.me --delete --region us-west-2
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run deploy:uidev:all && npm run deploy:uidev:gzip:css && npm run deploy:uidev:gzip:js && npm run deploy:uidev:gzip:html && npm run deploy:uidev:delete
scripts.build:lodash: grep -o -C 0 '_\.[^(]*' node_modules/restangular/dist/restangular.js | sort -u | sed -e 's/_\.//' | paste -d, -s - | xargs -I"{}" -t lodash -s -o app/js/components/lodash.custom.min.js -p include={}
scripts.build:hybrid:staging: npm run build:lodash && NODE_ENV=staging gulp hybrid
scripts.build:hybrid:production: npm run build:lodash && NODE_ENV=production gulp hybrid
scripts.build:staging: npm run build:lodash && NODE_ENV=staging APP_ENV=web gulp prod
scripts.build:production: npm run build:lodash && NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=web gulp prod
scripts.start: npm run build:lodash && APP_ENV=web gulp dev
scripts.emulate:android:staging: npm run build:hybrid:staging && ionic run android
scripts.emulate:android:production: npm run build:hybrid:production && ionic run android
scripts.build:android:staging: npm run build:hybrid:staging && ionic build android
scripts.build:android:production: npm run build:hybrid:production && ionic build android --release && ./distribute.sh
